en.notEnoughSlippage: The transaction failed, please check your Maximum Deposit Rate
en.generalError: There was an error, please try again
en.noCollateral: In order to borrow you need to have a deposit in the Variable Rate Pool marked as collateral in your Dashboard
en.borrowLimit: You can't borrow more than your borrow limit
en.floatingPoolBorrowExplanation: Variable rate borrow takes tokens from Exactly and  deposits into your wallet resulting in debt.
